meanings.definition: The part of the foot between the ankle and the toes.
meanings.sent1: She felt pain in her metatarsus after running for a long time.
meanings.sent2: He injured his metatarsus while playing soccer.
meanings.sent3: The metatarsus decided to take a break from all the walking.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the metatarsus supporting her weight.
meanings.sent5: The metatarsus is crucial for maintaining balance and stability.

meanings.definition: The bones in this part of the foot.
meanings.sent1: The metatarsus bones provide structure and support to the foot.
meanings.sent2: He studied the anatomy of the metatarsus in his biology class.
meanings.sent3: The metatarsus bones had a meeting to discuss their roles in walking.
meanings.sent4: The metatarsus bones are like pillars holding up the foot.
meanings.sent5: Injuries to the metatarsus bones can be quite painful and require rest.
